parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: ConnectionMode
parameters.description:
The connection mode of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Standard**: standard mode
*   **Safe**: database proxy mode

By default, this operation queries the instances that use any of the supported connection modes.

parameters.name: CurrentInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the current instance.

parameters.name: DBInstanceClass
parameters.description: The instance type of the instance. For more information, see [Instance types](~~26312~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance.

parameters.name: DBInstanceStatus
parameters.description: The status of the instance. For more information, see [Instance state table](~~26315~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceType
parameters.description:
The role of the instance that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **Primary**: primary instance
*   **Readonly**: read-only instance
*   **Guard**: disaster recovery instance
*   **Temp**: temporary instance

By default, this operation queries the instances of all roles.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description:
The database engine of the instance. Valid values:

*   MySQL
*   SQLServer
*   PostgreSQL
*   PPAS
*   MariaDB

By default, this operation queries the instances that run any of the supported database engine types.

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The version of the database engine.

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the instance expires. Valid values:

*   **True**: queries the instances that have expired.
*   **False**: does not query instances that have expired.

parameters.name: InstanceNetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Classic**
*   **VPC**

parameters.name: NodeType
parameters.description:
The type of the database node. Valid values:

*   **Master**: the primary node
*   **Slave**: the secondary node

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1 to 100**.

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go
*   **Prepaid**: subscription

By default, this operation queries the instances that use any of the supported billing methods.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that is used for the search. The keyword can be part of an instance ID or an instance description.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the instance.

parameters.name: proxyId
parameters.description: The ID of the proxy mode.
